title: Introduction
text:
Welcome to the Precision spraying and Biospraytech demo !
UMT ECOTECH aims at developping precision spraying for optimising application of products : quantity, way to target the crop, coverage and water volumes. Biospraytech is our program to use precision spraying for assessing the most appropriate methods and sprayers settings to spray biocontrol and obtain protection programs that meet the Green Deal objectives.
The prototype prepared by Berthoud and Optima to support this program can control each individual nozzle with a centrimetric precision on the vertical boom according to requirements provided in a map.
Vegetation maps such as made from mobile 2D Lidar measurements can also be used in the process.

title: Modulation map creation
text:
The modulation map is created from the experimental design map, where each experimental unit is a section of a grapevine row with a specific spray pattern and a specific PPP dose. The modulation map defines geographic polygons with volume rate instruction for each nozzle of the sprayer.



Nozzle numbers


The nozzle volume rate instructions in each polygon depend on the sprayer direction.



Modulation map creation

title: Experimental design
text:
In 2023, we made a field trial on a 2h commercial vineyard to explore how the spray pattern and the dosage of PPP affects the control of Powdery Mildew.
In this experiment, 2 factors were tested :

the dose of phytosanitary products : from 0.7 to 2x the reference dose (1N)
